content: In which file the api's are there?

The `WeatherMap.tsx` file [crop-main\src\components\WeatherMap.tsx:95-101] uses the geocoding API `https://geocoding-api.open-meteo.com/v1/search`.

The `QUICK_START.md` file [crop-main\QUICK_START.md:88-92] describes the following API endpoints:
- `GET /api/status` - System status
- `POST /api/pump` - Control pump
- `POST /api/lcd` - Update display
- `GET /api/sensors` - Sensor data
Where are the database files are stored?

The `README.md` file mentions that the project uses Supabase, a Backend-as-a-Service with PostgreSQL, and MongoDB, a NoSQL database [README.md:56-58]. It also indicates that database migrations are located in the `supabase/` directory [README.md:74].
